title: Tories must unite and stop Labour’s plot to wreck Boris Johnson's Brexit deal
text:
The choice before MPs is this agreement or an even deeper political crisis

Having written about how anxious Boris Johnson would be to close a deal with the European Union, even I was surprised by how far he was prepared to go to make sure of it. His change of policy to permit some customs checks between Northern Ireland and Great Britain simultaneously made the deal with Brussels possible, but carrying it through Parliament more difficult.

He did the right thing, in his own political interest but also in the national interest. The deal he agreed is the best that can be achieved in the extremely difficult circumstances of a divided Parliament and an imminent deadline. Of course, countless objections...
description: The choice before MPs is this agreement or an even deeper political crisis
